title: Le Logis des Quatre Puits
description: Vegetarian bed and breakfast in southwest France. Delightful manor house with 73 acre estate, within 50 minutes of stunning Bordeaux and historic St Emilion, centre of the famous wine region. Vegetarian and vegan evening meals using homegrown, local produce where possible. Free Wi-Fi and other facilities include library to read on your stay, a large equipped kitchen for b&b guests to use, and a lounge with a TV, DVDs and an honesty fridge of refreshments.
